definition.text: Anchor paragraphs are used together with the Docs Goto Command. When you want to generate a Docs Link to a specific part of a Docs Page, you first need to create an Anchor paragraph to be able to create the link to the specific paragraph in the page.

paragraphs.text: To correctly define an Anchor Paragraph, you need to follow the following syntax:
Anchor Name: This refers to any name that you would like to give to the newly created Anchor. The name must be unique within the page.
